prompt: <description>Part 1: Three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom The first part of the CAD model is a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The following instructions detail how to construct this part. **Step 1: Create the coordinate system** Create a new coordinate system with zero rotation and translation. Coordinate System - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] **Step 2: Draw the 2D sketch** Draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the coordinate system. Note that this sketch will be scaled and then transformed into a 3D sketch in later steps. Create a rectangle with four lines as shown below for the base of the prism: Sketch - Face 1 - Loop 1 - Line 1: [0.0, 0.0] to [0.75, 0.0] - Line 2: [0.75, 0.0] to [0.75, 0.6014] - Line 3: [0.75, 0.6014] to [0.0, 0.6014] - Line 4: [0.0, 0.6014] to [0.0, 0.0] **Step 3: Scale the 2D sketch** Scale the 2D sketch with a scaling factor of 0.75. Sketch Scale: 0.75 **Step 4: Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch** Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch using the default euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system for this prism. Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] **Step 5: Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model** Extrude the 2D sketch along the z-axis (normal direction) by the depth of 0.3187 units, which forms the prism shape. Extrude Depth Towards Normal: 0.3187 Extrude Depth Opposite Normal: 0 Upon completing these steps, you should obtain a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, having the following dimensions: - Length: 0.75 - Width: 0.75 - Height: 0.3187</description>
completion:
<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,0.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.0,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.6014]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.6014],"End Point":[0.0,0.6014]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.6014],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.3187,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>
